movies.title: Desert of Blood
movies.plot: In Tecate, Mexico, an American tourist is hunting a treasure buried in the sand of a ghost town with his girlfriend Amy. However, he digs the grave of the vampire Luis Diego, who was buried thirty-five years ago by his friend Father Hernandez. Luis Diego kills the tourist and leaves Amy contaminated in the desert. Then he meets his former sweetheart Sarita, who has a stroke after seeing him. In Malibu, California, Sarita's niece Maricela and her best friends Heather and Samantha are on vacation and they decide to travel to Mexico to help her family. The local Cris and his family decide to give a party to Maricela and her friends; however, when Luis Diego sees the girl, he recalls Sarita and decides to give a second chance to his love. But he is a vampire and his love is impossible.
movies.simplePlot: In Tecate, Mexico, an American tourist is hunting a treasure buried in the sand of a ghost town with his girlfriend Amy. However, he digs the grave of the vampire Luis Diego, who was buried...

biography.bio: Justin Quinn is an actor, known for Desert of Blood (2008).
biography.name: Justin Quinn

biography.bio: Brenda Romero is an actress, known for Sin Frontera (2014), Desert of Blood (2008) and No Absolution (2009).
biography.name: Brenda Romero

biography.placeOfBirth: Premià de Mar, Barcelona, Catalonia, Spain
biography.bio: Naim Thomas was born on October 16, 1981 in Premià de Mar, Barcelona, Catalonia, Spain as Naím Thomas Mansilla. He is an actor, known for Death in Granada (1996), Food of Love (2002) and Caresses (1998).
biography.name: Naim Thomas

biography.bio: Mikel Dusi was born and raised in Queens, New York. He worked in the Family Owned Pizzeria. (Galleria Pizza). He studied Shotakan Karate most of his life. He attended Christ The King High in Queens, New York. He then attended Nassau Community College in Long Island. Mikel Dusi Producer/Actor in the Feature Film "Amy Allyson Fans" that has been accepted by several film festivals. He was an associate Producer/Actor on the Theatrical released feature film "Alls Faire In Love" starring Christina Ricci, Cedric the Entertainer and Ann Margaret. He also produced the Original Web Series hit, "Ecommandos" specially produced for Comedy Central. 'How hard Can it Be?' is the next Feature Comedy film, which he's Producing/Acting that will be released during the summer of 2012.
biography.name: Mike Dusi

biography.bio: Annika Svedman is an actress, known for Surf School (2006), Desert of Blood (2008) and All In (2006).
biography.name: Annika Svedman

biography.bio: Flint Esquerra is known for his work on Raising Arizona (1987), Waxwork (1988) and Patty Hearst (1988).
biography.name: Flint Esquerra

biography.bio: Tori White is known for her work on NCIS: New Orleans (2014).
biography.name: Tori White

biography.bio: Natalie J. Horton is an actress, known for Desert of Blood (2008) and Candy Stripers (2006).
biography.name: Natalie J. Horton

biography.bio: Yvonne Rawn is an actress, known for Desert of Blood (2008).
biography.name: Yvonne Rawn

biography.bio: Josh Adamson is an actor, known for Unidentified (2006), First Landing (2007) and The Wedding Video (2007).
biography.name: Josh Adamson

biography.bio: Armando Alarcon is known for his work on Thor (2011), Bandidas (2006) and The Amazing Spider-Man (2012).
biography.name: Armando Alarcon

biography.bio: Agustin Bunuel was born on November 6, 1977 in Hialeah, Florida, USA as Agustin Jose Bunuel III. He is an actor, known for Gothic Vampires from Hell (2007), In Plain View (2008) and Desert of Blood (2008). He has been married to Yvette Hazel Bunuel since July 5, 2003. They have one child.
biography.name: Agustin Bunuel

biography.bio: Scott DeFalco is an actor and producer, known for General Hospital (1963), Going Down in LA-LA Land (2011) and After Dark (2013).
biography.name: Scott DeFalco

biography.bio: Jonathan DePaz is an actor and producer, known for Ghost Rock (2003), Storm (1999) and Eyeball Eddie (2001).
biography.name: Jonathan DePaz

biography.bio: Jackie Joyner is an actress best known for her work on prominent TV series such as Criminal Minds, The New Normal and Dr. Ken. Her work is mainly centered on television and her roles in TV sitcoms have given her much exposure in the industry. Jackie Joyner is from Detroit Michigan.
biography.name: Jackie Joyner
